Text: Intu iyaal Allah al-yihibbuku wa achaan da, khalli haalku tabga misil haalah.
Text_clean: intu iyaal allah alyihibbuku wa achaan da khalli haalku tabga misil haalah

Text: Iichu be l-mahabba al-misil mahabbat al-Masiih al-yihibbina lahaddi fadaana be ruuhah wa bigi misil hadiiye le Allah wa misil dahiiye al-tiraddi Allah.
Text_clean: iichu be lmahabba almisil mahabbat almasiih alyihibbina lahaddi fadaana be ruuhah wa bigi misil hadiiye le allah wa misil dahiiye altiraddi allah

Text: Laakin al-zina wa l-haal al-cheene wa l-tama’ khalli yabgo ma fiihum ambeenaatku marra waahid. Wa ma tihajju fooghum zaatah. Dool ma af’aal hana l-naas al-saalihiin.
Text_clean: laakin alzina wa lhaal alcheene wa ltama khalli yabgo ma fiihum ambeenaatku marra waahid wa ma tihajju fooghum zaatah dool ma afaal hana lnaas alsaalihiin

Text: Abadan ma tihajju kalaam cheen wa la kalaam hana l-safaaha wa abadan ma tal’abo ambeenaatku be kalaam fasil. Kulla l-kalaam al-misil da ma waajib. Fi badalah, hajju be chukur.
Text_clean: abadan ma tihajju kalaam cheen wa la kalaam hana lsafaaha wa abadan ma talabo ambeenaatku be kalaam fasil kulla lkalaam almisil da ma waajib fi badalah hajju be chukur

Text: Ni’akkid leeku kan naadum zannaay walla nijis walla tammaa’, hu ma yalga cheyy fi Mamlakat Allah wa l-Masiih. Al-tama’ hu misil ibaadat al-asnaam.
Text_clean: niakkid leeku kan naadum zannaay walla nijis walla tammaa hu ma yalga cheyy fi mamlakat allah wa lmasiih altama hu misil ibaadat alasnaam

Text: Ma tikhallu naadum yukhuchchuku be kalaam baatil. Be sabab al-zunuub al-misil dool, Allah yinazzil khadabah foog al-aasiyiin.
Text_clean: ma tikhallu naadum yukhuchchuku be kalaam baatil be sabab alzunuub almisil dool allah yinazzil khadabah foog alaasiyiin

Text: Achaan da, ma tichaarukuuhum fi haalhum.
Text_clean: achaan da ma tichaarukuuhum fi haalhum

Text: Awwal intu bas al-dalaam wa laakin hassa’ bigiitu nuur be alaakhitku ma’a l-Rabb. Iichu be l-haal al-waajbe le ahal al-nuur.
Text_clean: awwal intu bas aldalaam wa laakin hassa bigiitu nuur be alaakhitku maa lrabb iichu be lhaal alwaajbe le ahal alnuur

Text: Achaan nuur Allah yijiib al-kheer wa l-haal al-saalhe wa l-hagg wa hu yimagginhum fi guluub al-naas.
Text_clean: achaan nuur allah yijiib alkheer wa lhaal alsaalhe wa lhagg wa hu yimagginhum fi guluub alnaas

Text: A’arfu tamaam al-cheyy al-yiraddi al-Rabb.
Text_clean: aarfu tamaam alcheyy alyiraddi alrabb

Text: Ma tichaaruku fi amal hana ahal al-dalaam al-ma yimaggin cheyy adiil. Akheer afdaho al-cheyy al-humman gaa’idiin yisawwuuh.
Text_clean: ma tichaaruku fi amal hana ahal aldalaam alma yimaggin cheyy adiil akheer afdaho alcheyy alhumman gaaidiin yisawwuuh

Text: Achaan al-cheyy al-humman gaa’idiin yisawwuuh be talbiid cheen bilheen lahaddi nakhjalo kan nihajju beyah.
Text_clean: achaan alcheyy alhumman gaaidiin yisawwuuh be talbiid cheen bilheen lahaddi nakhjalo kan nihajju beyah

Text: Achaan ayyi cheyy kan ankachaf fi l-nuur khalaas yinchaaf.
Text_clean: achaan ayyi cheyy kan ankachaf fi lnuur khalaas yinchaaf

Text: Wa ayyi cheyy al-yinchaaf yin’arif be l-sahiih. Achaan da, nuguulu «He ya l-naayim, gumm foog ! Gumm min ust al-maytiin wa l-Masiih yidaawi foogak».
Text_clean: wa ayyi cheyy alyinchaaf yinarif be lsahiih achaan da nuguulu he ya lnaayim gumm foog gumm min ust almaytiin wa lmasiih yidaawi foogak

Text: Fakkuru tamaam fi haalku. Ma ti’iichu be haal al-jaahiliin laakin be haal al-faahimiin.
Text_clean: fakkuru tamaam fi haalku ma tiiichu be haal aljaahiliin laakin be haal alfaahimiin

Text: Sawwu al-kheer be kulla daliil achaan al-zaman al-gaa’idiin foogah da fasil.
Text_clean: sawwu alkheer be kulla daliil achaan alzaman algaaidiin foogah da fasil

Text: Ma tabgo mataamiis laakin afhamo muraadat al-Rabb.
Text_clean: ma tabgo mataamiis laakin afhamo muraadat alrabb

Text: Ma taskaro be l-khamar achaan al-khamar yisabbib illa l-kharaab. Laakin khalli Allah yamlaaku be l-Ruuh al-Khudduus.

Text: Achchaaja’o ambeenaatku be tasaabiih wa anaachiid wa madih min al-Ruuh al-Khudduus. Sabbuhu wa amdaho le Rabbina be niiye waahide.

Text: Achkuru Allah Abuuna fi kulla wakit wa fi kulla cheyy be usum Rabbina Isa al-Masiih.

Text: Abgo daluuliin ambeenaatku wa khalli ayyi waahid yikarrim al-aakhar fi chaan al-Masiih.

Text: Asma’o ya l-awiin, khalli ayyi mara tikarrim raajilha misil hi tikarrim al-Rabb.

Text: Achaan al-raajil hu ra’iis martah misil al-Masiih hu ra’iis ummatah. Wa ummatah hi jismah wa hu zaatah Munajji jismah.

Text: Wa misil ummat al-Masiih tikarrim al-Masiih, khalli kulla mara tikarrim raajilha fi kulla cheyy.

Text: Asma’o ya l-rujaal, hibbu awiinku misil al-Masiih yihibb ummatah al-fadaaha be ruuhah

Text: achaan hi tabga umma saalhe. Hu naddafaaha be khattisiin fi almi wa be kalaam Allah

Text: Wa kulla raajil waajib yihibb martah misil yihibb jildah. Al-yihibb martah yihibb nafsah.

Text: Abadan ma fi raajil al-yakrah laham jismah. Be l-aks, hu yi’ayyichah wa yirayyisah misil al-Masiih yirayyis ummatah.

Text: Wa ayyi waahid minnina udu min jismah.

Text: Wa l-Kitaab buguul ‹Fi l-sabab da, ayyi raajil yikhalli ammah wa abuuh wa yilimm ma’a martah wa l-naaseen dool yabgo jisim waahid›.

Text: Al-kalaam da sirr aziim. Ana nuguul leeku al-kalaam da bukhuss al-Masiih wa ummatah.

Text: Wa bukhussuku intu kula. Khalli ayyi raajil minku yihibb martah misil yihibb nafsah wa ayyi mara waajib tikarrim raajilha.
